reviews.sentence: Typical. Beautiful hotel and super accommodating staff per usual with the Ritz. Hotel was very well kept minus a few cosmetic flaws with the downstairs beach front bar. The staff was attentive courteous and always greeted me with a smile on their face. The wait at the pool for food and beverages was the only down side of the entire trip. I have never stayed in a Ritz I did not enjoy. The layout from the main entrance to the pool was a maze which I hope they can redesign in the future.

The Best of the Best. Simply the best Best location Best Service Best staf Best facilitiesVey helpful and friendly staff great food especially the pizza. The only reason for not getting the 5 stars is that rooms need some renovation.

I enjoy staying at the Ritz Miami every year but. The Miami Ritz has nice staff decent rooms and expensive food. The only thing that I would recommend is updating their rooms and maintain them better as they are starting to get old and rusty. Location is great. I have been staying at the Ritz Miami every year for the past few years in August and I enjoy it.

Disappointing food and needs new kitchen management pool needs updating. I have been to this hotel many times over the years. The food has been getting worse every year. Even the pool food is really substandard. They need a whole kitchen overhaul and new management. Food stays out on the kitchen counters for hours. Vegetables come out soggy in my BLT sandwich the tomatoes were gross guacamole and salsa with corn chips had been sitting out for hours in their kitchen and looked and tasted like pea soup and tasteless salsa the salads are soggy too and the salad dressing was warm on the side. What a disappointment for a great hotel but has been neglected over the years.
Lovely stay. Staff was wonderful especially at the pool. The rooms are a bit tired. Could use a spruce up.

Good location excellent hotel few flaws. It is a Ritz Carlton since the moment you arrive. People greet you in the best way and they are extremely nice and polite. Beach is good as well is the swimming pool areado not miss their breakfast buffet a must. My wife enjoyed a massage at the Spa it was superb and reasonable priced. Two flaws at the rooms beds are not at Ritz Carlton level and the A C is old and needs to be renewed. Other than that excellent bathroom and spotless cleaning.

Very comfy great staff perfect location. Oana was great at reception. Friendly helpful funny. In fact all staff noticeably wonderful including the maintenance staff. Room super comfy. Parking guy and doorman very nice. My breakfast was not very unique. Kind of boring. Eggs seemed like made in a template. Toast cold. Not super fresh.

Despite the awkward temporary location of the club level due to reconstruction and a VIP taking their 2nd location while undergoing reconstruction the people at the club made the stay a 5 star stay. Acomodating without being intrusive. Yet first class service. Kudos. Will be back. And yes. Beach service was great too. The housekeeping was slacking but was addressed by management. Over all great place to stay when in South Beach.

Amazing Hotel with a Great Location. I LOVED staying at the Ritz Carlton in South Beach. I stayed there during Art Basel and I enjoyed my experience. You simply can not beat the location close to the beach and pretty much everything else. Everything is walkable or a short Uber ride away from the Convention Center to shopping to restaurants. The service was fantastic particularly the doormen special thanks to Greg and Riley and those manning the bell stand. I had some packages delivered during my stay and they made sure I received them quickly and when one could not be found they made sure to double check and follow up with me to ensure it was eventually received and delivered. Ritz Carlton knows how to make sure guests feel welcomed from the moment they arrive until the moment they leave. As far as the rooms themselves they were comfortable spacious and CLEAN. No real complaints there. Room service and housekeeping were both great as well with the exception of one night when one of the housekeepers abruptly barged in asking if I needed evening turn down service. She said she just walked in without waiting because most of the other rooms on the floor had been empty so she made an assumption. That was highly inappropriate but I will not slight the entire hotel for one persons unprofesionalism. They ARE currently renovating the spa so if that will be part of your stay do take that into consideration. But I will say I still received impeccable service for my manicure and pedicure from the spa staff as they do their best to serve the guests with what they have. But overall I absolutely loved my stay and would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a truly luxurious hotel stay in South Beach.

Staff needs and attitude check. Multiple staff members from front desk guest services to maintenance and valets need to serious attitude check. As a platinum Ritz Carlton member I have stayed at multiple Ritz Carltons before but have never felt this unwelcome and ready to check out. Seemed like they got enjoyment over being pretentious and rude. I will take my business elsewhere.

Welcome Back. I recently stayed at the Ritz in South Beach and it was fantastic. The service was exactly as you would expect from a hotel like this and the pool restaurant redesign is beautiful. One employee to note is a woman named Asia who was working at the beach. My friend and I asked if the hotel had any beach games such as backgammon or cards. She said she would go and check. The hotel did not actually have cards but Asia walked over to Walgrens and bought playing cards herself and brought them back to us at the beach. It was very kind and thoughtful. she went above and beyond Highly recommend you stay here.
Beautiful and updated property. Remodeled property close to everything. We arrived past lunch time and chef was so nice to prepare a fresh ceviche that was delicious.

Stunning remodel excellent service fabulous restaurants. This has been an incredible treat. The remodel is superb fabulously tastefully done with modern flair. Keeping the Art Deco style alive in such a tasteful way. We highly recommend to stay here. The rooms are fabulous and the beds very comforable. The Spa Bar and public spaces are very inviting. Food was delicious and artfully presented. Service was great from the moment we arrived until we left. We can not wait to be back.

Stunning remodel excellent service fabulous restaurants. This has been an incredible treat. The remodel is superb fabulously tastefully done with modern flair. Keeping the Art Deco style alive in such a tasteful way. We highly recommend to stay here. The rooms are fabulous and the beds very comforable. The Spa Bar and public spaces are very inviting. Food was delicious and artfully presented. Service was great from the moment we arrived until we left. We can not wait to be back.

Great Massage with Katie at Spa. I recent visited the newly revamped Ritz South Beach Spa and had a fantastic massage session with Katie. I would definitely and highly recommend her and the spa next time you are in town. Both are great.
Beautiful location. Newly renovated and VERY great service and staff.

Fabulous. My staff I stayed at the recently renovated Ritz Carlton in South Beach were very impressed. The lobby bar are beautiful the location can not be beat great pool right on the beach good shopping along Collins Ave Lincoln Rd. The hotel staff is incredibly helpful the service was fantastic a personal shout out to Oana Jacobs the Room Operations Manager. Would definitely stay here again.

Beautifully renovated and so welcoming. I have stayed at Ritz Carltons all over the world and thanks to Alec front desk and Waldo bellman. this was the first time I felt truly welcomed as a guest. The property is newly renovated and breathtakingly beautiful. I hope to return again soon.

Bliss on the beach. The Ritz Carlton SoBe is finally reopenedI literally walked by in horror about 20 times during it ’s 2 12 year repair and renovation. I made certain to plan my return stay asap after reopening. Emily in guest relations made certain I had the perfect room. THANK YOU. My lanai room had a blissful pool partial ocean view on the 4th floor. Beautifully appointed with plenty of seating including three chairs and two bedside ottomans. Redecorated flawlessly with lovely white paneled walls and soft touches including area rugs in the bedding area. The lanai was refurnished with a lounge chair table and two patio chairs. The spa was also beautifully refurbished. But I did n’t see another guest in there 6 days in a row. Dining was very pleasant as well. The new lobby bar is very inviting and the resort fee includes two house punch drinks per day. Great place to take in the historic lobby. Also Josh rooms controller was very helpful with club access. I just had to check out the newly remodeled club. It was very quite and the club manager was clearly one of the handful of the leadership team that came from another Ritz Carlton property. The fitness center which I used everyday was about the same. It could definitely use more equipment. One gentlemen truly stood out. Emanuel at the pool had my chair set up in my favorite spot 30 minutes before I arrived at the pool each day. This is exactly what Ritz Carlton service is about. Perfect example of anticipation of guest needs. Top talent is hard to find in Miami and especially Ritz Carlton level of service. This is something you just understand or you don’t. There were a few bumps with housekeeping and inexperienced front desk staff but this is perfectly understandable as they just opened and the previous staff mostly did not return. Also the pool manager was very welcoming as he has greeted me by name for at least ten years. I have stayed here well over 100 nights and I am titanium. I felt very appreciated and recognized as a return guest. My only questionable take away is that the hotel was kind of slow especially the spa. There did n’t seem to be any grand reopening spa or dining promos. I thought that was odd. This study was magical and I already have three return reservation before summer. This is my favorite Ritz Carlton in the USThank you to the gracious stafGregory S.

Excellent Stay At Ritz Carlton SOBE. From check in to check out the service at this Ritz Carlton was excellent. Staff was very helpful and always had a smile on their face. No request was too much for them to fulfill. This Ritz was recently renovated and they did a great job updating the hotel. The hotel room was very clean and the bed comfortable. I utilized the pool during my stay and it was nice. Pool was not too deep and the water was warm. Staff by the pool were also attentive and friendly. I did not use the beach during my stay but the Ritz does have chairs and umbrellas on the beach for the guests to use. I recommend the Ritz Carlton South Beach to other travelers and I look forward to staying there again.
